Posts.Content: Aug 2, 2016 01:03AM crisw wrote: My last chemo treatment was April 25th, so 14 weeks ago. My hair seems to be growing back VERY slowly, especially compared to all the photos I see here! This is all I have...  Anyone else have growth this slow? I haven't started Arimidex yet but that's coming and I'm afraid it will slow down things even more :(
